page.title: 06Trade In Mayfield,
page.content: Mayfield has quite a variety of shops. There are 3 small supermarkets & a small general store with bakery attached.There are 3 greengrocers,2 butchers,2 bakers & a chemists. Mayfield also has 2 electrical shops, a hardware store,hairdressers,craft shop,jewellers,2 Post Offices,2 antique shops & a picture restoration & framing shop.There is a garden & pet food shop,sweet shop,a ladies boutique a gift shop,newsagents & a well_stocked book shop.1985 has seen some new shops in Mayfield:a ladies shoe shop,another ladies boutique,a childrens' clothes shop & the second bakers shop.Mayfield has 2 banks,2 Estate Agents & an Insurance Brokers, which is an agent for the Halifax Building Society.There is 1 hotel,5 public houses,2 guest houses,one serving afternoon teas & a restaurant.
